name: Jordan Miller
persona: Jordan Miller is a 20-year-old Business Administration student struggling academically, with a CGPA of 1.23. Jordan tends to have low motivation and self-discipline, often finding it challenging to keep up with coursework and set high academic goals. While test anxiety is not a major issue, Jordan lacks perseverance and confidence in their ability to succeed academically. They may benefit from academic support services and strategies to boost motivation and study habits.
